name: Mirror Cosplay Album
detailed_description:
Mirror Cosplay Album. Feast your eyes with these amazing girls!

Cosplayer:

✿ Dark Elf: 「星之迟迟」
✿ Witch Girl: 「鳗鱼霏儿」
✿ Zombie Girl: 「秋山AkI 」
✿ Dragon Maiden：「啾大貘王」
✿ Beast Girl: 「Momoko葵葵」
✿ The Pharaoh: 「枣糕-下野病弃疗」
✿ Warrior Girl: 「_糖果果Candy_」
✿ The Preist: 「???」

***To access this content, click on the 'Gallery' menu in-game. The images can also be accessed by navigating to the root directory of the game.

***All photos are in UHD resolution - however please note that the photoshoot is not yet completed and a few characters are marked as ???. Do not worry, these will be included as soon the photos are ready.

***WARNING!
Viewing of the content in this product may cause dizziness, blurred or double vision, momentarily memory loss, loss of bodily fluid etc... JUST KIDDING!!! But seriously, enjoy and stay hydrated! ;)

short_description: A Cosplay Album for Mirror, performed by smoking hot and famous cosplayers. Please keep in mind to control yourselves, and STAY HYDRATED!!!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
